title: Awoo Dede Lawson set for April 25 ring return at SEM Promotions’ Night of Reset
desc: Musah Rahman “Awoo Dede” Lawson, one of Ghana’s most disciplined and resilient boxers, is set to return to the ring on April 25 at the Bukom Boxing Arena as part of SEM Promotions’ Night of Reset.

title: Mt Eden prison death: Name suppression lapses for Auckland manslaughter defendant Peresia Tapui
desc: A Mt Eden Corrections Facility inmate charged with manslaughter after the death of an elderly cellmate is Peresia Tapui. The 28-year-old was charged last...

title: Global brand in an EFL world
desc: After a new £48m investment in Wrexham, what comes next for the club that is majority-owned by Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney?

title: Kate Middleton Debuts an Unexpected DIY Hairstyle on a Royal Outing
desc: The Princess of Wales sported multiple hair and outfit styles on a busy January outing in the north of England, even wearing a DIY braid.

title: Dove Cameron Recalls The Moment She Said 'Yes' To Fiancé Damiano David

title: Dark Energy Survey results: Standard model of cosmology holds up in 6-year study of the universe, with one big caveat
desc: The six-year Dark Energy Survey has released its full results, showing that two leading models of cosmology are equally valid — but both fail to explain one key observation.

desc: Once believed to be lost forever, a rare predator has been spotted in California’s remote forests.

title: Content Days Notes: First Rosenqvist Child Due During Indy 500

title: Don’t let ‘sleepmaxxing’ keep you up at night: Results from the 2025 American Academy of Sleep Medicine survey on sleep tracking
desc: More Americans are tracking and changing their sleep habits, but the growing cultural focus on sleep data is also increasing anxiety, with orthosomnia leaving many people awake at night.
